name: @capacitor-trancee/nearby-connections
description: Uses Nearby Connections peer-to-peer networking API that allows apps to easily discover, connect to, and exchange data with nearby devices in real-time, regardless of network connectivity
author: Philipp Grosswiler <philipp.grosswiler@gmail.com>

scripts.verify: npm run verify:ios && npm run verify:android && npm run verify:web
scripts.verify:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean build test && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run prettier -- --check && npm run swiftlint -- lint
scripts.fmt: npm run eslint -- --fix && npm run prettier -- --write && npm run swiftlint -- --fix --format
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run docgen && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs
scripts.upgrade: npm install --upgrade @capacitor/cli @capacitor/core @capacitor/docgen @capacitor/android @capacitor/ios @ionic/eslint-config @ionic/prettier-config @ionic/swiftlint-config eslint prettier prettier-plugin-java rimraf rollup swiftlint typescript
